018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util.internal;
019
020import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
021import static java.lang.Long.compare;
022import static java.lang.String.format;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Base32.getEncoder;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.repeat;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.SystemUtils.getRandom;
027
028import java.time.Instant;
029import java.util.Objects;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Base32.Encoder;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.TSID;
036
037/**
038 *  The implementation for the interface
039 *  {@link TSID}.
040 *
041 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
042 *  @version $Id: TSIDImpl.java 1076 2023-10-03 18:36:07Z tquadrat $
043 *  @since 0.1.0
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 *
047 *  @deprecated Do not use any longer! This is not tested!
048 */
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TSIDImpl.java 1076 2023-10-03 18:36:07Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
051@Deprecated( since = "0.3.0", forRemoval = true )
052public final class TSIDImpl implements TSID
053{
054        /*------------*\
055    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
056        \*------------*/
057    /**
058     *  The internal representation of a TSID is a {@code long} value.
059     */
060    private final long m_Id;
061
062        /*------------------------*\
063    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
064        \*------------------------*/
065    /**
066     *  The beginning of the epoch for these ids.
067     */
068    public static final Instant BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT;
069
070    /**
071     *  The node number for the TSIDs.
072     */
073    public static final long TSID_Node;
074
075    /**
076     *  The shift to convert the current time into the time-base used by this
077     *  class.
078     */
079    public static final long SHIFT;
080
081    /**
082     *  The encoder for
083     *  {@link #toString()}.
084     */
085    private static final Encoder m_Encoder;
086
087    static
088    {
089        BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT = Instant.parse( BEGIN_OF_EPOCH );
090        SHIFT = BEGIN_OF_EPOCH_INSTANT.toEpochMilli();
091
092        final var nodeId = Integer.getInteger( PROPERTY_TSID_NODE, getRandom().nextInt( MAX_NODES ) );
093        if( nodeId < MAX_NODES )
094        {
095            TSID_Node = (long) nodeId;
096        }
097        else
098        {
099            //noinspection LocalVariableNamingConvention
100            final var e = new ValidationException( "Node id '%d' is too large, value must be less than %d".formatted( nodeId, MAX_NODES ) );
101            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
102        }
103
104        m_Encoder = getEncoder();
105    }
106
107        /*--------------*\
108    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
109        \*--------------*/
110    /**
111     *  Creates a new instance of {@code TSIDImpl}.
112     *
113     *  @param  id  The internal representation of a TSID is a {@code long}
114     *      value.
115     */
116    public TSIDImpl( final long id )
117    {
118        m_Id = id;
119    }   //  TSIDImpl()
120
121        /*---------*\
122    ====** Methods **==========================================================
123        \*---------*/
124    /**
125     *  {@inheritDoc}
126     */
127    @Override
128    public final long asLong() { return m_Id; }
129
130    /**
131     *  {@inheritDoc}
132     */
133    @Override
134    public int compareTo( final TSID other )
135    {
136        final var retValue = signum( compare( m_Id, other.asLong() ) );
137
138        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
139        return retValue;
140    }   //  compareTo()
141
142    /**
143     *  {@inheritDoc}
144     */
145    @Override
146    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
147    {
148        var retValue = this == o;
149        if( !retValue && o instanceof final TSIDImpl other )
150        {
151            retValue = m_Id == other.m_Id;
152        }
153
154        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
155        return retValue;
156    }   //  equals()
157
158    /**
159     *  {@inheritDoc}
160     */
161    @Override
162    public final int hashCode() { return Objects.hash( m_Id ); }
163
164    /**
165     *   {@inheritDoc}
166     */
167    @Override
168    public final String toString()
169    {
170        final var base32 = m_Encoder.encodeToString( m_Id );
171        final var retValue = format( "X%s%s", repeat( "0", TSID_Size - 1 - base32.length() ), base32 );
172
173        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
174        return retValue;
175    }   //  toString()
176}
177//  class TSIDImpl
178
179/*
180 *  End of File
181 */
